snippet: Mayor Bill de Blasio was heckled at a news conference in Brooklyn on Monday by Charles Barron, a former City Council member whose political style is heavy on theatricality.
abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio, in Brooklyn for the groundbreaking of a low-income housing development in East New York, finds himself briefly upstaged by heckling from Charles Barron, an outspoken former City Council member from the district who accuses de Blasio of being a 'pseudo-progressive' and of not appointing enough blacks to positions of power in his administration.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Bill de Blasio was heckled at a news conference in Brooklyn on Monday by Charles Barron, a former City Council member whose political style is heavy on theatricality.

headline.main: An Ex-Councilman Upstages the Mayor at His Own Event
headline.print_headline: An Ex-Councilman Upstages the Mayor at His Own Event
